event.title: Local group meeting of the FSFE Community Bonn, in Bonn, Germany

body.p: On Monday, 13th of December, at 7pm (CET), the monthly meeting of the Bonn FSFE Fellowship will take place. The Bonn FSFE Community Meetings ("Fellowship Meetings") are regular meetings which are taking place on every second Monday of the month. The current meeting place is Dotty's at BTHV, Christian-Miesen-Stra√üe 1, 53129 Bonn. The meetings are open for everyone who is interested in Free Software.
